quest.name: Disclosure
journal: Lord Haurchefant thinks you could do with a well-deserved rest.

Although the trial is ended, Lord Haurchefant must attend to some minor formalities before Alphinaud and Tataru can be released. In the meantime, he suggests that you return to the manor, and discuss the day's events with Count Edmont.

As usual, your conversation with the count is cut short, this time by the arrival of a message from the Vault. It would seem that His Eminence Archbishop Thordan VII has requested your presence. Hasten to the Holy Vault and speak with the priest outside the entrance to be granted admission.

Thordan VII warmly welcomes you and apologizes for the misunderstanding that led to Alphinaud and Tataru's incarceration. Having taken the highly unusual step of dismissing his personal guard, he then reveals to you that he has communicated with the Ascians, going on to explain that he is paying lip service to their wishes while plotting to move against them. He asks for your help in this endeavor, stating that only by wresting Eorzea from their grasp can a lasting peace ever be forged. Return to Fortemps Manor and share this disturbing revelation with Alphinaud.

Alphinaud is shocked to learn that the Ascians' influence has also spread to Ishgard. Even as he ponders a course of action, Tataru remembers with a start a troubling rumor she had heard. It would seem that Raubahn is to be executed for crimes against the sultanate. Determined not to lose yet another ally, Alphinaud resolves to do everything in his power to rescue the deposed Flame General.
objectives: Speak with the priest at the Vault.
Speak with Alphinaud at Fortemps Manor.

dialogue.name: HAURCHEFANT
dialogue.text: Black chocobos are all well and good, but the true reward for your efforts is the exoneration of your comrades.

dialogue.name: HAURCHEFANT
dialogue.text: They shall be released upon the completion of certain minor formalities, which I mean to see to personally. In the meantime, pray return to Fortemps Manor. The count has done so already, and will doubtless be eager to discuss the day's events.

dialogue.name: HAURCHEFANT
dialogue.text: Rest assured that Master Alphinaud and Mistress Tataru are no longer in danger. They will join you at the manor anon.

dialogue.name: ARTOIREL
dialogue.text: I was not present at the trial, but my father told me of your performance. He said you were a wonder to behold!

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: Are you trying to become the talk of the city? Because if you are, you're doing an admirable job of it.

dialogue.name: HONOROIT
dialogue.text: It brings me joy to see you in good health, MistressMaster Surname.

dialogue.name: EDMONT
dialogue.text: Halone smiles on us yet again, MistressMaster Surname, guiding you to victory and setting your comrades free.

dialogue.name: ARTOIREL
dialogue.text: I confess, I did fear for your safety. Which is not to say I doubted your prowess, you understand... I merely knew the strength of your opponents. Ahem. You do have a habit of exceeding my expectations.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: Besting two of the Heavens' Ward while the city's elite looked on? By the Fury, anyone who hasn't been paying attention to you will surely do so from now on!

dialogue.name: HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD01598
dialogue.text: M-My lord!

dialogue.name: HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD01598
dialogue.text: We have just received a message from the Vault. His Eminence the archbishop requests the presence of MistressMaster Surname.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: An invitation from the archbishop!?

dialogue.name: ARTOIREL
dialogue.text: What an honor...

dialogue.name: EDMONT
dialogue.text: A personal summons is indeed a great honor, and given recent events, you would be wise not to delay...

dialogue.name: EDMONT
dialogue.text: Go, MistressMaster Surname. We shall speak anon.

dialogue.name: HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD01598
dialogue.text: A priest will be waiting for you outside the Vault. Identify yourself to him and he will escort you inside.

dialogue.name: EDMONT
dialogue.text: Do not worry about Master Alphinaud and Mistress Tataru. We will tend to them when they return from the Tribunal.

dialogue.name: HOUSEFORTEMPSSTEWARD01598
dialogue.text: In case you have forgotten, the Vault lies at the opposite end of the Hoplon. Pray do not keep His Eminence waiting.

dialogue.name: PRIEST01598
dialogue.text: We are honored to receive you, MistressMaster Surname. This way, please.

dialogue.name: PRIEST01598
dialogue.text: I nearly cried when you stepped forward at the Tribunal, Forename! Thank you, thank you, thank you!
